title: IT Helpdesk Ticket Classifier
description: Built an NLP pipeline to classify and auto-prioritize IT support tickets (hardware, software, network, access). Improves SLA adherence by routing high-urgency tickets instantly.

title: Windows Server Log Anomaly Detection
description: Ingested Windows Server event logs, engineered temporal features, and trained anomaly detection models to flag suspicious patterns (e.g., repeated failed logons, privilege escalations).

title: Reddit Sentiment Dashboard (Tech Communities)
description: Scraped subreddit posts/comments, stored in PostgreSQL, and visualized sentiment trends across time and topics. Deployed an interactive dashboard for exploration.

title: Crime Data Mapping & Hotspot Analysis
description: Aggregated public incident data, cleaned it, and built a mapping interface to visualize hotspots and temporal patterns for community insights.
